# Governance

This project is maintained by the repository owner and designated maintainers.

## Maintainers

- Martin (@flitzrrr)

## Decision Process

- Small changes: direct approval by a maintainer.
- Larger changes: review discussion in a pull request.
- Security issues: follow the process in `SECURITY.md`.

## Code of Conduct

All participants must follow `CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md`.
